data.name: Sexy Gym
data.detailed_description:
Playmeow Games

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1778320/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1925210/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1820050/

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1309000/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1259740/


About the Game

I love going to the gym!

In Sexy Gym - Morris' Training Diaries you must manage your time, keep up with the fast-paced training and unlock various tasks. Your training and the changes to your body will affect your fate at the end of the game!

Story:
Morris has always dreamed of having the perfect chiseled body.
His accidental discovery of a uniquely lewd gym led him to a shocking discovery: his d*** can also be trained!
Fix your diet, train regularly, use the gym equipment, and embrace your very own happy ending!

Features:
◆ Feast your eyes on our Live2D animated CGs!
◆ Six different endings and over 50 achievements
◆ 20 heart-pounding Live2D H-scenes
◆ The main girl is fully-voiced!
◆ Unlock CGs with ease!*

data.short_description: I love going to the gym! Guide Morris through his training at this unique gym as he gets intimate with his trainer! Fix your diet, get familiar with the equipment, boost your stamina, and hone your focus to see your trainer in glorious Live2D action!
data.supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit OS
  • Processor: i5 3300 3,20 GHz 4 cores/4 threads
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760 2 gb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit OS
  • Processor: i5 3300 3,20 GHz 4 cores/4 threads
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760 2 gb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10+
  • Processor: 4Ghz Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible, 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10+
  • Processor: M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3 GB Dedicated VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
- All characters depicted in this game are adults aged 20 and above.
- This game contains gratuitous amounts of adult content and depictions of sexual intercourse.
- Please do not replicate the ridiculous made-up fitness positions & advice outlined in the game.
